  • Element
com.wordnik.swagger.annotations

Annotation Type ApiOperation


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ApiOperation
    Describes an operation or typically a HTTP method against a specific path. Operations with equivalent paths are grouped in an array in the Api Declaration. See https://github.com/wordnik/swagger-core/wiki/API-Declaration

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String value
      Brief description of the operation

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Authorization[] authorizations
      authorizations required by this Api
      String consumes
      media type consumed by this Api
      boolean hidden
      Allows an operation to be marked as hidden
      String httpMethod
      the HTTP method, i.e GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS
      String nickname
      the nickname for the operation, to override what is detected by the annotation scanner
      String notes
      long description of the operation
      int position
      allow explicit ordering of operations inside the Api Declaration
      String produces
      content type produced by this Api
      String protocols
      protocols that this Api requires (i.e.
      Class<?> response
      default response class from the operation
      String responseContainer
      if the response class is within a container, specify it here
      ResponseHeader[] responseHeaders 
      String[] tags
      A list of tags for API documentation control.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Brief description of the operation

      • notes

        public abstract String notes
        long description of the operation
        Default:
        ""

      • tags

        public abstract String[] tags
        A list of tags for API documentation control. Tags can be used for logical grouping of operations by resources or any other qualifier.
        Since:
        1.5.2
        Default:
        ""

      • response

        public abstract Class<?> response
        default response class from the operation
        Default:
        java.lang.Void.class

      • responseContainer

        public abstract String responseContainer
        if the response class is within a container, specify it here
        Default:
        ""

      • httpMethod

        public abstract String httpMethod
        the HTTP method, i.e GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS
        Default:
        ""

      • position

        public abstract int position
        allow explicit ordering of operations inside the Api Declaration
        Default:
        0

      • nickname

        public abstract String nickname
        the nickname for the operation, to override what is detected by the annotation scanner
        Default:
        ""

      • produces

        public abstract String produces
        content type produced by this Api
        Default:
        ""

      • consumes

        public abstract String consumes
        media type consumed by this Api
        Default:
        ""

      • protocols

        public abstract String protocols
        protocols that this Api requires (i.e. https)
        Default:
        ""

      • authorizations

        public abstract Authorization[] authorizations
        authorizations required by this Api
        Default:
        @com.wordnik.swagger.annotations.Authorization(value="", type="")

      • hidden

        public abstract boolean hidden
        Allows an operation to be marked as hidden
        Default:
        false

      • responseHeaders

        public abstract ResponseHeader[] responseHeaders
        Default:
        @com.wordnik.swagger.annotations.ResponseHeader(name="", response=java.lang.Void.class)
